MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G82 postcode area of Dumbarton, affecting properties in Glasgow Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.11am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair due to third party damage on our network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.50pm on Monday 7th December 2020.
